parameters: There's a little trash in here.
Cleanest stove I've been in front of in a while.
I wasn't expecting company. I've neglected to dust.
Let me find you some clothes you can use as pajamas.
I should have extra linens in the storage closet too.
The downstairs bathroom is to the left if you need it.
Was it? I just knew what I was looking for.
They're old, but I promise they're clean.
They're probably cleaner than my work shirt.
I should have some spare toiletries in the garage. You could change while I fetch those.
You are my guest. If there's anything you need, please don't hesitate to ask.
I'm a little surprised you own this. It's hard to imagine you in it.
Well, they're from middle school. I figured they'd be the closest fitting things I own.
Even still, they're large on you. Your frame is quite small.
I like my clothes baggy anyway. And I like stripes.
Yes. That is also the stripiest thing I own.
Can I fix you some dinner?
Although, frankly, there's not much in the house.
I'll go shopping for groceries tomorrow morning. Do you have any requests?
I mean, get the basics if you don't have them... but I could just come with you.
There's only one bed upstairs, so please take it.
I’ll be right down here on the couch if you need anything.
Oh.\.\. No, no.\.\. I'm not gonna take your bed.
Please. I insist you do. The couch is comfortable, anyway.
My mother would kill me if she knew what a terrible host I was being.
I'll leave a toothbrush and toothpaste down here for you, then.
What time do you sleep? I try to be in bed around 8:30, myself.
That makes sense, considering your shifts.
Would you care to watch something with me?
I don't have cable, but I have a decent collection of videotapes.
Let's see. \|Perhaps it's not a good true crime or horror night.
It is. I've seen this dozens of times.
It's one of the tapes my siblings and I would fall asleep to.
Oh. We could watch something else you've seen less.
Well, think of it like this.
Do people stop listening to songs once they know the lyrics?
Good films can be enjoyed countless times the same way.
Fair enough. I mean, putting on an album I know front to back is really calming for me.
I must come off like some hoarder, what with my old clothes, my old tapes.
I'm not sitting over here just, like, casting random aspersions in your direction.
I didn't mean to imply you were.
Adri kinda had a point about you.
Although I haven't figured out how to beat the allegations yet.
She said I have "RBF." She then informed me what that was upon my inquiry.
Haha. Yeah. I think she ribs people she likes.
I won't repeat what "RBF" stands for, but it means you come off somewhat cold without meaning to.
I know what Resting Bitch Face is, Lee.
I think she just means you should relax a little is all.
I am relaxed. I am calm.
It's like the more I insist, the less people believe me.
Then how about you drop your shoulders and stop ripping the skin on your fingers off?
